returns._0: boolean for whether the position can be forclosed.

params.token: address of the token to deposit

params.positionIsToken0: true if token escrowed is token0, and margin paid by trader was token1.

returns.premiumOwed: amount of premium taken from premiumDeposit to poolManager

params.isToken0: true if token0, false if token1
params.reciever: address of the recieve of funds

payPremium((address,address,uint24),addr.notice: pays premium for a position, can only repay after 24 hours since last payment*, transfers deposited premium from the pool to the facility, doesn't transfer anything from the user.

documentation.text: @return boolean for whether the position can be forclosed.
